<modDoc>

Spectral Multiband Resonator

Multiband resonator and filter bank by 4MS Company

Scale Banks

Press the ROTATE knob while turning to change the Bank. The colors of the Env Out lights will change to show what Group you are in (blue, pink, green, orange, or white). One of the six Env Out lights will flash to indicate which Bank in the group is selected (1-6).

Blue Group Equal Temperament

  1. Major scale/chords

    Key of C-Major

    1. Major Chords
    2. Major 6th chords
    3. Major 7th chords
    4. Aug chords
    5. Aug 7th chords
    6. Dom 7th chords
    7. Pentatonic Low
    8. Pentatonic High
    9. Major Scale C1
    10. Major Scale B3
    11. Major Scale A6

    Key of C-Major

    11. Harm Min A6

Orange Group Non-Western Tunings

  1. Indian Pentatonic

    1. E0 to ~C♯3
    2. E1 to ~C♯4
    3. E2 to ~C♯5
    4. E3 to ~C♯6
    5. E4 to ~C♯7
    6. E5 to ~C♯8
    7. E6 to ~C♯9
    8. Spread 1, 120Hz
    9. Spread 2, 120Hz
    10. Spread 1, 20Hz
    11. Spread 2, 20Hz

  2. Indian Shrutis

    22 note octave

    1. 16.35 – 31.04Hz
    2. 32.7 – 62.1Hz
    3. 65.4 – 124Hz
    4. 131 - 248Hz
    5. 262 - 497Hz
    6. 523 - 993Hz
    7. 1046 - 1987Hz
    8. 2093 - 3973Hz
    9. 4186 - 7947Hz
    10. 8.3k – 15.9k
    11. 16.7k - 20k

  3. Mesopotamian

    1. ISHARTUM A1
    2. ISHARTUM A4
    3. EMBULUM A1
    4. EMBULUM A4
    5. NIDMURUB A1
    6. NIDMURUB A4
    7. QUABLITUM A1
    8. QUABLITUM A4
    9. KITMUN A1
    10. KITMUN A4
    11. MITUM A1

  4. Gamelan Pelog

    1. Java (5 notes) low
    2. Bali (7 notes) low
    3. Pelog, var1, low
    4. Pelog, var2, low
    5. Pelog, var3, low
    6. Java (5 note) mid
    7. Bali (7 note) mid
    8. Bali (7 note) high
    9. Pelog, var1, high
    10. Pelog, var2, hi
    11. Pelog, var3, hi

Green Group Modern Tunings Tunings

  1. Wendy Carlos's Alpha Scale

    Selected notes

  2. Wendy Carlos's Alpha Scale

    More elected notes

  3. Wendy Carlos's Gamma Scale

    Selected notes

  4. 17 notes/octave

    Scales are arranged consecutively from 13.75hz to 20 kHz

  5. Bohlen-Pierce Tritave

    Every 13 notes the frequency triples. Consectutive scales

  6. “296” EQ Frequencies

    Each scale is shifted up 50 cents from previous
